Oct. 10, 2004 D SCABA Autumn Contest (Championship Section)

Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Leas Cliff Hall, Folkestone, Kent, England, UK Hymn Tune: Regent Brass Best Soloist: Dawn Culver (Euphonium) - Friary Guildford Best Percussion Section: Welwyn Garden City Best Basses: Kortrijk Brass Conductor's Prize: Keith Maxwell - Friary Guildford
